definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: But the Democrats have lost their sixtieth vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是，民主党人丧失了其第六十票。

sentences.english: Democrats generally endorse the cap-and-trade plan in the bill.
sentences.chinese: 民主党人普遍赞同议案中的限制和贸易计划。

sentences.english: What does Horsey think of the Democrats' fascination with Clinton?
sentences.chinese: 霍尔西是如何看待民主党人对克林顿的迷恋呢？

sentences.english: Ten Democrats bolted on this vote.
sentences.chinese: 十名民主党人在这次投票中拒绝支持本党候选人。

sentences.english: Wait a minute, we thought he was a Democrat.
sentences.chinese: 稍等，我们认为这一位是一名民主党人。

sentences.english: It is no accident that Democrats, in particular, have been eying China as a line of attack.
sentences.chinese: 民主党人对中国的一线攻击并不令人感到意外。

sentences.english: Democrats dismissed the moves as political gimmickry.
sentences.chinese: 民主党人将此举斥为政治伎俩。

sentences.english: But Democrats prevailed in a number of close races.
sentences.chinese: 不过，民主党人在若干难分伯仲的选战中获胜。

sentences.english: The former state attorney general and congressman seems like a perfectly decent mainline Democrat.
sentences.chinese: 这位前任州检察长和国会议员是地道的主流民主党人。

sentences.english: Democrats elected two hundred thirty-five Representatives.

sentences.chinese: 哈金斯博士是民主党人。

sentences.english: Alexandra Acker is the exact executive director at the privately found the privately-funded Young Democrats of America.
sentences.chinese: 但是民主党人和共和党人仍然再向年轻人做演讲。

sentences.english: A Democrat uttering such sentiments would have been drummed out of the party a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 几年前如果民主党人说这种话可能会被赶出党外。

sentences.english: In some voters’ minds, Democrats are associated with an assault on masculinity itself.
sentences.chinese: 在一些选民眼里，民主党人同攻击男子气相联系。

sentences.english: Congressional Democrats have been the targets of threats and destructive acts following the health care vote.
sentences.chinese: 医改投票后国会民主党人成为恐吓和威胁的目标。

sentences.english: Members of the Democratic Party called the raid a plot by the Republican Party.
sentences.chinese: 民主党人说，这次袭击是共和党人精心策划的。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
Nancy Pelosi (1940-), US Democrat politician from California, speaker of US House of Representatives from 2007
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4
